languages.text: "Здесь хватает работы. Пираты и контрабандисты, ложноверцы и хладные торговцы, дезертиры и беглецы от закона... Каждый нуждается во внимании".
"And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."
languages.original_text: "Здесь хватает работы. Пираты и контрабандисты, ложноверцы и хладные торговцы, дезертиры и беглецы от закона... Каждый нуждается во внимании".

traits.locale_text: "And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."
"And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."
"And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."
"And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."
"And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."
"And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."

languages.text: “而我在这方面还有很多事情要做。海盗、走私犯、叛教者、冷市商人、逃兵、亡命之徒……每一群人都需要留意。”
languages.original_text: "And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."

traits.locale_text: “而我在这方面还有很多事情要做。海盗、走私犯、叛教者、冷市商人、逃兵、亡命之徒……每一群人都需要留意。”

languages.text: 「あの前線では沢山の課題がある。海賊に密輸業者、背教者やコールド・トレーダー、更に脱走兵、そして無法者…全員から目が離せない」
languages.original_text: "And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."

traits.locale_text: 「あの前線では沢山の課題がある。海賊に密輸業者、背教者やコールド・トレーダー、更に脱走兵、そして無法者…全員から目が離せない」

languages.text: «Y hay mucho que hacer en este frente. Piratas y contrabandistas, apóstatas y comerciantes fríos, desertores y criminales... Cada uno de ellos merece atención».
languages.original_text: "And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."

traits.locale_text: «Y hay mucho que hacer en este frente. Piratas y contrabandistas, apóstatas y comerciantes fríos, desertores y criminales... Cada uno de ellos merece atención».

languages.text: "Und an dieser Front gibt es viel zu tun. Piraten und Schmuggler, Apostaten und Kalthändler, Deserteure und Gesetzlose ... Jeder von ihnen benötigt Aufmerksamkeit."
languages.original_text: "And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."

traits.locale_text: "Und an dieser Front gibt es viel zu tun. Piraten und Schmuggler, Apostaten und Kalthändler, Deserteure und Gesetzlose ... Jeder von ihnen benötigt Aufmerksamkeit."

languages.text: « Et croyez-moi, il y a fort à faire dans ce domaine. Pirates et contrebandiers, apostats et adeptes du Commerce Froid, déserteurs et hors-la-loi... Chacun d'eux représente un problème à régler. »
languages.original_text: "And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."

traits.locale_text: « Et croyez-moi, il y a fort à faire dans ce domaine. Pirates et contrebandiers, apostats et adeptes du Commerce Froid, déserteurs et hors-la-loi... Chacun d'eux représente un problème à régler. »

languages.text: "Ve bu cephede de yapılması gereken çok şey var. Korsanlar ve kaçakçılar, dönekler ve Soğuk Tacirler, asker kaçakları ve haydutlar... Hepsiyle de ilgilenilmesi gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "And there is much to do on that front. Pirates and smugglers, apostates and Cold Traders, deserters and outlaws... Every one of them warrants attention."

traits.locale_text: "Ve bu cephede de yapılması gereken çok şey var. Korsanlar ve kaçakçılar, dönekler ve Soğuk Tacirler, asker kaçakları ve haydutlar... Hepsiyle de ilgilenilmesi gerekiyor."
